General.Name: Zhejiang Jinggong Science Technology
General.Description: Zhejiang Jinggong Integration Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells solar photovoltaic equipment, carbon fiber composite equipment, new building energy-saving equipment, textile special equipment, and robot intelligence equipment in China and internationally. The company provides new energy high-end equipment, including polysilicon ingot furnaces and squarers, and diamond wire slicing machines. It also offers building materials comprising PU/mineral wool/PIR sandwich panel lines, HVM double-deck high speed roll forming machines, HL-310-type fence board production lines, JZW digital control folders, XBJ type of sandwich composite production lines, and down pipe forming and curving pipe machines, as well as high speed tile, roll, purlin, and floor deck forming machines. In addition, it provides textile equipment, such as JGT1000 series and winders, as well as fancy twisting, rotor spinning, double twisting, and coated wire machines; and carbon fiber new material high end equipment. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zhejiang Jinggong Integration Technology Co., Ltd. in March 2023. Zhejiang Jinggong Integration Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1968 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
